mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM PROJECTNAME_MOVIE where MOVIECODE=#{MOVIECODE}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PROJECTNAME_MOVIE(MOVIECODE, TITLE, OVERVIEW, RELEASE_date, VOTE_verage, genre_ids, POSTER_URL) VALUES(#{MOVIECODE}, #{TITLE}, #{OVERVIEW}, #{RELEASE_date}, #{VOTE_verage}, #{genre_ids}, #{POSTER_URL})
mapper.select: select director, count(director)from (select * from (select u.*, m.*, c.choicedate from projectname_choice c left join projectname_user u on u.usercode=c.usercode left join projectname_movie m on m.moviecode=c.moviecode) where usercode=#{usercode}) group by director order by director desc

select actor, count(actor)from (select * from (select u.*, m.*, c.choicedate from projectname_choice c left join projectname_user u on u.usercode=c.usercode left join projectname_movie m on m.moviecode=c.moviecode) where usercode=#{usercode}) group by actor order by actor desc

select genre_ids, count(genre_ids) as count from (select * from (select u.*, m.*, c.choicedate from projectname_choice c left join projectname_user u on u.usercode=c.usercode left join projectname_movie m on m.moviecode=c.moviecode) where usercode=#{usercode}) group by genre_ids order by genre_ids desc

select title, count(title) from (select u.usercode, u.id, u.nickname, m.title from projectname_choice c left join projectname_user u on u.usercode=c.usercode left join projectname_movie m on m.moviecode=c.moviecode) where usercode=#{usercode} group by title order by count(title) desc
select m.title, r.* from (select moviecode, count(moviecode) as count from projectname_choice c group by moviecode) r left join projectname_movie m on r.moviecode=m.moviecode;
